abstract: Advertising column; century-old Girl Scouts of the USA introduces marketing campaign to increase membership, donations and volunteer ranks by showcasing its leadership initiative GIRL, which stands for go-getters, innovators, risk takers and leaders; new approach emphasizes its cookie selling as business skills program, and includes pop anthem, public service announcements and national gathering.

headline.print_headline: More Than Cookie Sellers: The Girl Scouts Buff Their Image
headline.main: More Than Cookie Sellers: The Girl Scouts Buff Their Image

snippet: To counter any perception that scouting is dated, the Girl Scouts are promoting their GIRL initiative — for go-getters, innovators, risk takers and leaders....
lead_paragraph: To counter any perception that scouting is dated, the Girl Scouts are promoting their GIRL initiative — for go-getters, innovators, risk takers and leaders.
